mapper.select: SELECT tor.id, tor.userId, tor.orderNo, tor.goodSnapShotId, tor.deliveryId, tor.orderStatus, tor.createDate, tgs.goodId, tgs.goodName , tgs.goodDescription , tgs.promotion, tgs.price, tgs.discount, tgs.mainImgUrl FROM t_order tor LEFT JOIN t_good_snapshot tgs ON tgs.id= tor.goodSnapShotId WHERE tor.orderStatus = #{status}
mapper.insert:
